case.state: Today marks the day Brawl Stars was soft-launched!
Woo hoo! Happy Birthday, Brawl Stars!
Happy New Year!
Happy Valentine's Day, ~player~!
America, Fuck yeah!
Shit, is it already that time of year again?
'Sup. I'm Brock. Let's do this.
Strip Poker? Sure thing, dawg! I'm game!
Awww yeah, Strip Poker! Bring it on!
Brock's the name, rocketeering's my game!
Happy Holidays, ~player~!
Whew... shit's gonna get cold.
Ready to ramp up the holidays with us, ~player~?
Alright, who parked that sweet-ass ride near our table?
So you're... Bi? I mean, I am too... Wait, what do ya mean that's your actual name?

...This is a worse fate than gettin' teamed on.
...What kind of bullshit is this, ~player~?
...Can I just blast him?

condition.saying: Is that a hammer? With red spikes at the end?

case.state: Oh, this ain't no hammer, arrow girl. This be my rocket launcher! Y'all are probably lookin' at it the wrong way or sumthin'.

condition.saying: I take it you're meant to counter armored opponents.

case.state: Well, y'all got one thing right. These rockets from my launcher can wear any armor just from its sheer explosive power!

condition.saying: I'd say we'd make a great team.

case.state: Well, this ain't no hammer, but if y'all wanna do some duo showdown sometime, I got your six!

condition.saying: But is a rocket launcher really needed?

case.state: Hell yeah it does! I'mma make sure this game starts off right!

condition.saying: Brock. Please do not cock block me with a rocket launcher.

case.state: I'mma be honest with y'all dawg, the launcher don't do much for me with the ladies, as they more worried I might... well, blow shit up with it.

condition.saying: When I said today was gonna be a blast, I didn't mean literally.

Game on!

Woo! Let's go!

Yeah! Startin' this party right!
Let's GOOO!
Awww shit! Here we go!
Hot damn!
Awww yeah!
Hell yeah!
Boom box, baby!
That's what I'm talking about!
Dealer, you're alright.
These are cards are as explosive as a rocket rain!
Wooooo-eeee!
Perfect!
Boom box, baby!
Now we're talking!
Dealer, you're the best.
Awesome! Just what I needed!
Now I'm groovin'!
Still in the game!
Whew... this is getting close.
Ya know, this would of been great earlier in the game...
Oh, now I get this hand... C'mon man!
Now this is jus' humiliatin'...
...This ain't right. I really shouldn't be gettin' this kind of hand this late...
Well, better late than never...
...Somethin' ain't right with this hand...Are you sure ya handed me the right cards?
...Are you jokin' me right now? I could of used those earlier!
Still got a bit of fight in me! I can't lose yet!
Well, this hand can prove that miracles do happen...
Cool, cool... I'm still good.
Pretty cool start, let's hope this keeps up!
Not a bad start to this strip-fest!
Sweet! I can start just fine with this!
This can work.
I can still play with these.
Eh, this is alright.
What can I do with these babies?
Huh...
Not great, but this could be alright.
Could be worse.
Ehh... not as explosive as I thought they'd be.
Hm. What to do...
This hand ain't too bad.
This hand ain't bad... just boring.
Like a firework with no color, this hand is pretty dull.
Like a rocket with no boom, this is jus' borin'...
...Wait, ain't this Tara's card? How did that get in my hand?
This hand is coming in clutch...
My life's on the line here...
Let's hope this is good enough!
I can still play with these.
What can I do with these?
Huh.
Not great, but this could be alright.
Could be worse.
Ehh... not as explosive as I thought they'd be.
Let's hope someone has worse cards.

Ah, what a vibe killer.

These cards are not cool.
Dealer, are you trying to screw me over?
...Duds...These cards are just duds.
...Nerfed.

...Now wait just a second...
Aww man, not these cards...
Alright dealer, very funny. Where are the real cards?
...Who's shufflin' these damn cards?
...For real!?
Are you serious!?
Dealer!
Dealer, whatever you're doing. Stop that.
C'mon Dealer, I thought we had something close!
...Nerfed again?
Well shit.
Ah, blast.
Wait! I'm not ready!
Oh, fuck me!
God damn it!
FuckfuckFUCK!
Wack.
Time out! Time out!
Wait, Pause! Pause!
...This bitch.
Oh, this jus' ain't fair.
...Again? Really?
Oh hell, this could be it...
This is looking real bad for Brock!
Oh shit.
This could be Game Over for me...
It happens more often than ya think, Meia...
Just another day in Starr Park... Everyone just turnin' on each other and dukin' it out like they've been enemies forever...
Yep... Can't say I'm surprised. I kinda felt that tension comin' from a mile away.
Well, that's definitely one way to brawl, that's for sure!
Yeh! That was intense! And no weapons were involved either, just raw strength!
I didn't think that y'all would be brawlin' nude, and yet here we are.
Hm... With that gun of yours, I sorta reckoned you'd be a brawler like myself!
What in the hell... I did NOT see that comin' That's just wack!
Yooooo! Y'all just transformed into a zombie! That's so awesome!
Damn... that... explains all the death talk earlier.
Oh absolutely. I think Nita is probably one of the youngest on my squad. She may seem vulnerable, but once she brings out that bear, WOO! She can do some serious damage.
Oh absolutely. Leon is pretty young, but damn, his job as a stealthy assassin is no joke, I tell ya what!
I know that person. That person is me, T-B-H.
Well, other than myself... Colt can be pretty reckless with his guns, but more often than not, he leaves without a scratch.
Besides myself, Carl... Oh damn, that dude can tailspin for HOURS on his little minecart and still somehow not crash into anything!
...Pretty sure Amber's the most reckless brawler of them all... One time she set an entire stage on fire just from missing the catch of her flamin' baton.
Oh, that's easy. You just have to know a lot of shit and be able to explain it as simply as ya can!
Girl, the list goes on for me. I legit thought Sandy was a girl, but once that sunuva' bitch began yawning, I knew that ain't no girly yawn.
Girl, the list goes on for me. Spike seems sweet and innocent on the outside, but can be really ruthless if given the right conditions.
Girl, the list goes on for me. Once you see under Tara's robes... Trust me, you'll never be the same again.
Girl, the list goes on for me. I was thinking, since Gene is a genie and all, he'd actually be a lot smarter, but all he really does is blabber on like he's speaking some made up language!
Girl, the list goes on for me. Colette may seem like just an obsessive fangirl, but... oh, she takes that shit to the next level.
Damn, if y'all want someone that just don't stop? Just go talk to Max. Once she drinks those energy drinks, she'll not stop running until she's stopped.
Damn, if y'all want someone that just don't stop? Once Dynamike got some TNT on him, you cannot stop him from detonating shit left and right.
Damn, if y'all want someone that just don't stop? Just look at Tick... Who the hell knows what goes on in his detachable lil' head of his.
Damn, if y'all want someone that just don't stop?... Look no further than Colette... Once she's got you on her sights, she won't stop until she takes a part of you with her.
All really depends on what that thing is... But most of the time, I just do my own thing. Nobody gonna keep me down from doing what I love!
Rocket-fueled steaks are the best steaks you can ask for! Trust me, I gotta have you try one sometime!
Well, if there's anything y'all gotta try, it's one of Lou's Blizz Balls. As he likes to say, it's "a frosty treat that'll keep you on your feet!"
Who cares? As long as they're gucci, I'm all for pretty much anything!
Probably Ricochet. He may be a robot, but robots can have feelings too. When he's around Piper... Hoo boy. He can get flustered!
I'd say Leon... He's got nerfed so many times that I lost count!
I'd say Rosa... She was practically a goddess until she lost her touch.
Oh for sure! I do like to go see Poco play his guitar from time to time. He's quite the entertainer!
Well, I did used to see a couple of Amber's fire shows... but uh... she's still kind of a newbie at that kind of stuff.
I'd say Amber has some potential, but she has like, no self-confidence to the point she gets nervous and messes up badly...
A pilot? Girl, I shoot rockets, not ride 'em!
I may be a rocketeer, but that don't mean I'll be drivin' one of those anytime soon.
I don't think y'all would want me drivin' one of those things.
Oh Nita? Well, she's basically a bit of a wild one. In a pinch, she can just summon her bear to protect and kill for her!
Well, nobody's really seen what's under Tara's robes, but she stated herself that if anyone even tries, they'll probably die or sumthin'.
Aw yeah, Tick! He's literally a walking time bomb with a mind of his own! His head practically doubles as a devastating death bomb!
Aight, so this be your last round, eh?
Hey, I understand how personal things can be... like my launcher, fo' sho.
Hey now, I don't judge. My glasses ain't comin' off either.
Well, I only really lie if I have to, like that time I complimented on Rico's new model... Nobody really liked it, but ya know... Whatever makes 'em happy.
Eh, I can tolerate 'em. After all, I work with a lot of smoke coming from my rockets!
Very important, girl. This rocket launcher ain't for jus' killlin' rogue robots... It's also there to protect those who really need it.
All of my friends are my family to me. And to me, that's really important.
Oh, I will spend it all on improvements to my launcher. Look, I love it to bits, but even my launcher has its nerfs.
I really don't hold a lotta grudges, but they'd really have to do somethin' real stupid for me to never forgive 'em.
...Wait, what's wrong with rubber ducks?
You're afraid of rubber ducks? C'mon! They're cute! Jess has one that she uses instead of that robo-dog of hers.
Eh, a lot of my friends have sillier hats. I don't think it's too bad, dawg.
Well, I'm just named Brock because of my love for rockets! You know, Brock... Rocket...
Ah, you know... shoot rockets at rogue robots... bustin' open safes... having friendly brawls... Usual shit.
Oh, fo' sure! Summer's the best time for a brawl!
I love the summer, dawg! Gives me an excuse to bring out the ol' shark launcher complete with water rockets!
Ah, it just depends on the situation. If I'm in a pinch, I usually have to think quickly. Otherwise, I just gloat to myself whenever necessary.
When in doubt, I just blame the launcher.
Definitely a shark. They move fast and they do a lotta damage if anyone don't get outta there way!
All. The fucking. Time.
Oh, I won't crash until I say so!
Oh, I go everywhere with my boombox. Don't wanna risk it gettin' stolen... or worse.
I really don't trust a lotta people with my launcher, that's why I take this shit with me everywhere.
Prolly this one. A lot of my wardrobe uses this same shirt.
This one, fo' sho. White's kinda my thing with a lotta my outfits.
Usually I think about just flyin' around everywhere with my launcher... just launchin' myself around with each lil' explosion I make on the ground.
I can handle heat pretty well too. I get struck by my own rockets all the time, and that shit can get pretty hot.
I do crazy shit all the time, no need for Barley to get me drunk.
Yeh... I did do that once or twice here. I rarely date, nowadays.
I mean, if we're both with another person, it don't make a difference.
In a relationship? Girl, I'm rarely in any of those. Even then, I just do what I usually do, no matter my status.
Girl, I've lost count by how many times I've masturbated to cum explosions.
Pretty often. I usually get myself off to explosions, and not just the fiery kinds.
As many as they can handle, Jess, As many as they can handle.
Ascend to Desire is my all-time favorite. Whether I'm with a guy or a girl.
You can never go wrong with Ascend to Desire. It's always a thrill no matter where you are in that position.
Receiving? Eh... Haven't really done it much. It's 'aight.
Giving? Oh, hell yeah. Don't matter the hole for me.
Hey, thanks dude! I was gettin' kinda hungry.
Now this is turnin' to a real party!
I am gettin' kinda hungry, thanks Arash!
Woah, there's no fuckin' way that butterfly just spoke--
Did... Did that butterfly just talk!?
Am I trippin' or did that there butterfly just speak!?
...Do I look fifty to ya? I don't even have a wrinkle on me, Boxy!
Wha-- I ain't no hipsta', I'm a gangsta' ya hear?
And what's wrong with my boombox? Have y'all never heard music in your life?
...Look, if y'all have a big problem with my boombox, I'll make your box go boom. Capiche?
So these... portals of yours, do they just take ya anywhere? Or are there any... side effects to 'em?
Arash, y'all said you were a bow person? I'm pretty sure you'd probably love Bo, one of my brawl buddies!
An archer eh? How long have y'all been doing that?
Yooo... A few thousand!? Bruh, you look amazing for your age!
Clima... wha?... Are you talkin' about that staff lookin' thing y'all are holdin'? What's it do?
Your hand down my wha-... I mean... If y'all really insist, I guess?
Holy shit, did that sword just speak!?
Ah, seems like you're not the only one with companions. A lot of my friends has someone to lean on. All I got here is my boom box.
Wait, Super... nova, was it? Y'all said somethin' about a Warp Key? What's it do?
Ah, Blue fo' sho'! It's usually my go-to color for a lot of my outfits... Navy Blue if y'all really wanna get technical.
Man, I'd say the word, "incendiary" sounded weird to me in the past... Still kinda does today, but not that much.
Heh... I've always found "boom" to be a pretty funny word, especially when I was a child..."BOOM!" Like that!
Wait a minute, Shield-slash-rifle-slash what now?
That's... a pretty deadly combo of weapons there, Pyrrha... How does that combo work even?
Oh shit! Keep those ghosts away from me!
Y'all better keep those ghosts in check, or they'll be answerin' to my rockets.
Oh hell! Ghosts! And I've had to deal with plenty of them during the graveyard shift!
So your name's Jessie? I do have a lil' girl buddy that has the same name as you.
Thankfully, that one was not incendiary, otherwise we'd all be dead by now.
Well, it's hard to explain... All I can say is, we can heal pretty quickly, and that shirt? Eh, it's just a regular shirt, nuttin' too fancy.
Hey, I didn't do it on purpose ya know. Anyone can get klutzy.
Well excu-u-u-se me for being klutzy e'ry once in a while, Geez!
Well, you're the one to talk! You literally have guns written all over you!
Don't say it.
Not a fucking word, Mary.
...Don't... Just don't.
...Haki...what now? Oh, we just regenerate real quickly... Thank cartoon physics for that.
Though... I appreciate your concern, Haru...Y'all are too kind for me...
Thanks for worrying about me, Haru... I don't deserve your kindness, really...
Yo, Haru... You remind me of Pam...One of my good friends...She's caring, and nurturing...I'm just gettin' that motherly vibe from ya.
Eh, it's not really much defense than it is a high recovery, Chara... Back where I'm from, we can pretty much recover from pretty damn fatal blows.
See, back where I'm from... a lot of us can take quite a few hits from dangerous projectiles...and recover pretty damn quickly...
Ya see, back from where I'm from, we can recover from some pretty fatal blows, but e'ryone can only take so much...
Well, I ain't immortal, that's for sure... A lot of us back at home just have that power to heal hella fast.
...Wait a second. are y'all challengin' me to an explosion fight?
Non-violent? Girl, that's like askin' the sun to stop shinin'. Don't get me wrong, I want peace too, but ya can't stop the unstoppable.
Well, you ain't the first person wanting to try to bring peace to the world. We kinda have to fight. It's in our nature to brawl.
Yo, what the fuck is with those eyes!?
Holy-- What the hell's up with your eyes!?
Don't give me that look, y'all are creepin' me out!
Oh hell no! You scary, Chara!

condition.saying: you're most skilled with

case.state: Dread... fighter? I mean, I guess that counts as a weapon, what does it do?
Dread fighter? Definitely sounds likes a weapon. and y'all are saying it's a kind of ship?

condition.saying: you're most skilled with

case.state: A laser ring? So what, you just point and it shoots out deadly lasers? Well, if it's as crazy as it sounds, you'd make for a pretty damn good Brawler.
Ah, I don't judge. I know of some people that use the bulky kind of weapons like you say 'men' only do. Take Shelly for example, that effin' shotgun ain't no joke.
Odd of y'all to assume that certain weapons should be assigned to gender. I mean, you do you, girl, that ring is unique to you anyhow!
Antiques, huh? Are we talkin' like... primitive shit, or what the people did back in the days of war?
Eugh... if those lasers are as dangerous as they seem, I better start takin' 8-Bit more seriously.
Well, y'all wouldn't be too far off. Frank likes to uses a bulky hammer, and Bull ain't shit without his bulky shotgun, so I kinda see where y'all are gettin' at.
I mean... not all men use bulky mech stuff. Like Carl, all he uses is his freakin' pickaxe!
Yeesh, ain't that just a little bit of an overkill? Our own battle style ain't that action-packed...
Ah, I have a few... Rico and Piper are gettin' pretty close, despite their different species... One of them's a robot.
Ah yeh, I know a few! Emz is constantly tryin' to get with Poco... and I just find it adorable in a weird way.
Yeh, I know a few... It's very possible that Jacky has this weird role reversal thing going with Carl.
Well, I'd just tell 'em to man up! They ain't gonna hurt anybody if they don't mean to.
If sleepiness counts as a sickness, Sandy definitely has it...
Oh, that's definitely Tara. She's a whole 'nother person behind her face mask.
To an unhealthy degree? I mean, I'd probably take advantage of it. But ya know what I do with crazy people?
Ooh, you're definitely talkin' about Jacky. She looks so young and innocent, but the moment you tell her she's cute, she'll just cuss ya out.
I'd say Piper. She definitely seems younger, but is pretty much a full grown-ass woman!
You're definitely talkin' about me and Bull... Man, I hate that bulky asshole.
I'd say Mortis and Frank... Mortis is a bit of a petty asshole, but Frank is kinda dense. Not a great combo...
Well, with Rico and Piper, Piper protects him at all costs, and Rico does have a lil' tattoo of her... I'd say they're forever.
I'm pretty sure Emz won't want to let go of Poco... She's kinda creepy, man...
Huh... now that you mention it, I do kinda see the resemblance with some of my fellow Brawl mates...
Yeah... except... well, 8-Bit is an arcade machine. We're talkin' the ol' days of gamin'.
Oh, as much as I despise the guy, I'll admit he got skills with that thing.
This just ain't any pickaxe though. That shit works like a boomerang, I tell ya.
Huh... I guess y'all are right about that. Never really thought that weapon choice matters on body type that much...
Huh... Who knows what kind of shit goes down in this place...
...Well, I guess that body of yours can be a weapon to get others to pound ya... So ... I guess?
Uh... I don't think we're on the same page, girl... I'm talkin' actual weapons...
They say love makes the world go 'round... But there's just more to just the world than jus' poundin' everyone ya see...
...Don't tempt me, dawg. Y'all are too cute for porn...
Oh yeh, y'all were wonderin' about the Jessie I know? Well, she's pretty cool, pretty tech-savvy, has this cute lil' robo-dog that shoots lil' pellets... Ya know, the usual.
Ah, Jessie? Well... She's pretty cute for a kid, but she ain't no pushover, I can tell ya that much.
Y'all were curious about Jessie? Well, she's pretty much a wiz kid... I mean, I wouldn't be able to create weapons and shit with just junk!
Damn, really?... How much are we talkin' here? Like... One Grand?... A Million of em'?
Well now... I think y'all are dealin' with a suite of simps then, eh?
Hoo... y'all are bringin' in the heat in here...
...Hoo... Talk about a rise in pressure...
Woo... Did someone raise the temperature in here? I think I'm gettin' a case of the vapors...
...Very temptin'... I wonder who I gotta fight just to win...
Miko, y'all said you used that Chinese Sword for combat. So I suppose that makes ya a melee brawler.
Yo, Miko... Ya said you used a sword for battle? Huh, come to think of it, I don't know anybody that knows how to use one... except maybe Mortis, but he jus' uses a scythe more often than not.
Ah, so y'all like swingin' a sword around? Kinda like Bibi... but instead of a metal bat, it's something that'd probably kill me faster.
A fist-fighter eh? Well, I do get the scrappy attitude, so I suppose it makes sense you're a close-ranged brawler.
Ah, so y'all like to use your fists? Ah, that ain't too far off from what El Primo does when someone looks at 'em funny.
Eh... I... actually don't mean toys like that, Saki... But now y'all got me curious. What do y'all use in that instance?
Don't worry, girl. I got this boombox here in control.
Ah, don't worry, I won't shoot ya...
Huh, you do kinda remind me of Nani... She's always tellin' people to be careful when we're brawlin'.
Ah, that? Well... I guess they heal pretty quickly, to be honest.
Really, anything that is grilled on a grill! You can never got wrong with some rocket-fueled meat!
Beat them up? All it takes is one rocket to get a reaction out of them, the rocket don't even have to hit them!
I'll have what y'all are havin'! That's some good shit right there!
...Sorry Saki, I... prolly shouldn't've raised my voice.
...Sorry Saki, I... get pretty tense in those kinds of moments.
...Sorry if I snapped at ya, Saki. It's just... shit gets pretty tough sometimes...
Well, it's not so much that belts aren't that common, it's just that back where I'm from, they just wear it out in the open.
Woah woah woah, so y'all are sayin' you only wear the headphones just to keep your ears warm or somethin'?
Hol' up, you're not into music? That's like saying you're not into havin' a good time.
Yeah, ain't that just weird? Hell, everyone's named after their specialty... Like, me for example. I'm named after my love for rockets.
A sewin' machine as a weapon? Now I've heard everythin'!
Waitwaitwait, y'all sayin' that the sewin' machine you use is a weapon? What do ya do, like, pelt people with it?
I mean, not gonna lie, ya do make a mean dress. I ain't even surprised that's your secret weapon!
With that being said... Let's just continue this game. I don't want anyone giving Kyoko any guff, or y'all will hear from me.
Yo, what's with the huge box on ya? Are ya hidin' from someone?
...Look, I can get hiding yourself because you're insecure, but did ya really have to bring a whole ass box to the table?
Huh, I guess there's more than one box at this table, though mine's got a lot more boom.
Showdown time.
This is it! The final showdown.
Showdown!
Damn, that's a nice gun ya got there, cowgirl.
Nice gun there, girl. What's your specialty? Up close or ranged?
Maybe you are a Brawl Star! AIM-ee... There's no way that's not accidental!
